text: I can’t say enough good things about Carol’s Carpet! Slade was amazing- very helpful throughout the entire process and took care of everything we needed! He was absolutely amazing to work with and very professional. The quote was super reasonable and they got everything installed in a very quickly. The installers were fantastic as well. Super kind, courteous, and professional! We will definitely be using them again!

name: Jamelle DuBose
text: Kasey and Kelly are awesome to work with ... they helped me pick the perfect backsplash and granite countertops for my kitchen remodel !!! I’m now working with Kasey on re-carpeting my home she help me pick the perfect carpet for my family needs and the prices you can’t beat I love shopping with Carols Carpet!!!

name: Annette Stainback
text: My flooring is beautiful. I worked with Stephanie to choose just the right floor and we are so pleased with how it came together. The installers did a great job.

name: Luci Davis
text: Thanks Stephanie Wright for my beautiful new carpet!!!!  It looks amazing.  You helped me pick out the perfect color!! I will be using you again!

name: Leslie Ingram
text: I had an amazing associate Stephanie Wright that took a bad experience somewhere else to the best experience I could receive. We love our floors and will continue our business with Carol's because of her.

name: Edna Burgess
text: I was so disappointed the sale woman came to our home to measured there was a point she just won't listen to me about the how i want our floors. It has been three day we call her and she never got back to us.

resp.text: We are very sorry to hear that you had a less than perfect experience at Carol's Carpet Flooring America.  We will do everything we can to address any issues you may have had.  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Mary Lim
text: I had a great experience wih Carol s carpet!  Stephanie Wright was so helpful in picking out flooring, a backsplash, and counter tops for my kitchen.  She has a excellent sense of  olors and was knowleable in so many ways.  She made everything easy.  I have been really pleased with my purchases.

name: Nate Jaeger
text: Carol's went above and beyond to make sure everything was right with my insurance claim to replace the kitchen floor. Their sales rep was friendly and very knowledgeable and their installers were efficient but thorough. For good, honest service and affordable flooring, I choose Carol's Carpet!

name: cece ph
text: Wow what a positive experience. First Brett was just awesome explain what I needed how about those installers. They were awesome, quick, friendly and professional and not to mention installing on Saturday. Will I use this company again? Heck yea I would.

name: Kayla Thacker
text: Carol's Carpet In Prattville will be the only place I Shop my in home needs. Stephanie Wright was the biggest help ever. She helped Design my entire kitchen. She made the buying and ordering process streamline and stress free. I absolutely LOVE the final product and I could not be happier. Carol's Carpet went above and beyond to make sure that my floors and counters were ordered and installed with minimal wait time. GO TO CAROL's CARPET in Prattville. I promise you will not be Disappointed!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Shundalynn Hall
text: I would definitely recommend Carol’s Carpet. Sales consultant Michael Andrews provided excellent service. He helped me choose flooring that best fit my needs and style preference. The flooring installation was completed earlier than expected.

name: Carl Jones
text:
Had my flooring replaced due to water damage.
Total experience was of the highest of professional standards, Susan McNulty gave that extra personal touch from helping me with the proper colors and ensuring I chose a good product for my needs, visited my home to make sure I was making a good choice.
INSTALLERS were exceptional in all areas, I would recommend them for all flooring needs THESE INSTALLERS ARE GOLD!!! PROFESSIONALS!!
To Susan McNulty , Brett Wallace and the Installers crew , THANK YOU!!!!

name: Sweetwater Apartments of Prattville
text: Wade and Kyle are the best!!!!

name: Sarah Gimblett
text: Nice people but over priced

name: Big Spaulding
text: carols carpet was very pleasant and had satisfactory services but left a bad taste in my mouth

name: Lord Strangewood
text: Cold place

name: Bradley Dortch
text: Love this store and all of its staff!! I frequent the store several times a month and everyone is always so welcoming and extremely helpful each and every time that I’m looking for pieces to decorate my home with. If your looking for quality pieces, tons of selections, the friendliest staff then look no further than Stock & Trade. I’m definitely a customer for life!!

name: Jessica Bahouth
text: We love Stock and Trade. The customer service is incredible. We work with a particular fabulous consultant, John, who has helped us elevate the look of our home. He is very knowledgeable and has wonderful taste. The entire staff is wonderful and friendly. I didnt feel pressured or hovered over. The prices are fair and the inventory is beautiful. John truly goes above and beyond to make sure we get exactly what we want. Even if he has to order it! wish I could give them 6 stars!

name: Denise Upton
text: John Herrington Interior Designer for Stock and Trade helped me redecorate my condo in Orange Beach. He does an awesome job and is great with mixing colors and accessories. He also helped me decide on a rug for my living room as well as new decorative pillows and a new coffee table. He is excellent to work with, makes quick and accurate decisions and responded to my phone calls or texts. I have used his decor services before Stock and Trade and will use him again in the future. I highly recommend him.

name: Candace Thompson
text: Stock and Trade is by far my favorite spot to purchase for my personal home and for my Designing Company. Sales Associate John Herrington is so amazing to deal with, he goes above and beyond to find what I’m looking for and helps me put things together for the perfect look. I can’t say enough wonderful things about this place. I highly recommend!

name: Pam Breedlove
text: What a fabulous find! A friend told me about the store so I decided to come and look for accessories for our beach house. I was pleasantly surprised to find such a well designed space with beautiful options. The vignettes were well thought out and appointed; a much more sophisticated look than the Destin store. While shopping I found out that John Herrington was responsible! He had helped me at his old job with an apartment for our son in Los Angeles. Great eye and sincere service. Plan to be back at this store to work with John on our future projects!

name: Sheena Mincy
text:
My husband and I came into Stock & Trade after loosing our home in Hurricane Sally. From the moment we entered the store, the service we received was incredible. We explained our situation to John [Herrington] and he went above and beyond to help us make our house into a home again. John’s knowledge of interior decorating is second to none. He’s now one of our trusted friends and continues to follow up w/ our family.
We’ve been back to the store a number of times, since our initial visit and everyone there has been extremely helpful and welcoming. Especially, when we bring our 5 y/o. Karley is always great about playing with her.
S&T is definitely our go to for home furnishings!

name: Jason Lawrence
text:
The kind of customer service that makes you cringe.

Edit:  Nah I am good, no need to reach out to you, I walked in the store last week. I said I was just looking, I was asked 5x before we left if we needed help finding things and many times sales was trying to strike up conversation.  Just looking means that I want to look and not be harassed.

resp.text: Jason, We hate to see this.  Could you please call or send more details about your experience to SpanishFort@StockandTrade.com.  Thank you!

name: Kalyn Miller
text: This team is amazing! They make you feel comfortable in the store and goes above and beyond to help you create a beautiful space!!

name: Gerald Smith
text:
My wife and I visited this store Tuesday March 30 at 1:00pm. Strolled through the entire store without not one hello from any employee.
I don't understand why you would spend so much money on advertising to get floor traffic when you don't even acknowledge a potential customer?

resp.text:
Gerald,
We hate to hear about this experience.  We are looking at video to see where the breakdown occurred because that is not typical.   We do provide a non-pressure environment and received a complaint just last week from a customer because he felt we asked if he had any questions or needed any assistance too many times in his opinion, but in this case low pressure was taken too far.   If you could provide any more details via email to support@stockandtrade.com so that we can look into it further would be greatly appreciated.  I sincerely apologize and hope that you will give us another chance to show you what we have to offer.

name: Addison Williams
text: Beautiful store and friendly staff

name: Michael Brooks
text: I’ve bought/sold nearly a dozen homes, listing with various big box real estate agencies, but none more interested in the customer than Real Estate Evolved. I got full asking price in less than 3 weeks. I wanted to list my home for $15k less but Mr. Walker convinced me otherwise. In all the real estate decisions I’ve made Real Estate Evolved was the simplest and best return on investment I’ve made. Thank you thank you thank you!

name: Toni Raby
text: If you are looking to buy or sell your home, this company is for you. Why would you pay more??? I’ve never used a real estate company that was so invested in me. It’s not about just selling your home, it’s about the relationship that they build with you and making sure that you are making the right decisions for your family. I’ll never use anyone else. Love Love Love this company!!!!!

resp.text: Thanks Toni! Looking forward to working with you again in the future!

name: Hunter Vines
text: These guys are just the best when it comes to helping you and getting you to where you need to be. A++ in every aspect!

name: Joel Brown
text: Great company! Zack goes above and beyond for his clients!

name: brandon joyce
text: Zach will do anything to make the selling of your property or buying experience special. Don’t forget bearded is always better.

name: David Gough
text: Flat rate fee is impossible to beat. Zach will go the extra mile every time!

name: Larry Johnson
text: We lucked out with this company. Scott worked us into their very busy schedule, and very friendly, and efficient. The guys laid 400 square feet of floor tile. And did an excellent job. Would definitely recommend .

name: Debbie Dunaway
text: Great selection to help design interior and exterior of your new home or renovation.

name: Mark Boackle
text: Fantastic selection and design ability combined with superior service.

name: david hudson
text: Usually find what you need there. Helpful people.

name: Noeli Moreno
text: Good stuf for your home

name: Crystal Cooley
text: Beautiful stuff

name: Johnny Winters
text: Nice

name: Elisabeth Wells
text: Always a delight to shop here. Best, most unique things, hand picked by a woman of excellence taste.

name: Vera Ringold
text: BEAUTIFUL furniture and accent items.

name: Francis Brown
text: Different and unique pieces of furniture and accessories.

name: Monique Martin
text: Great selection for home furniture

name: Krissi Harpel
text: All the reviews were great so I was excited to get started with this company.  Their representative came to the house and brought a contractor, I was told it would take about a week to generate an estimate of materials.  During that week I sent some colors I liked and a couple of questions and I was not getting any response from the designer .  Once the week was up I sent an email to the designer and told her I needed someone who was going to be responsive to emails .  She immediately responded saying that she could not get my cabinets to meet our timeline and I would have to find someone else ...which if she had paid attention I had asked for an estimate on painting and replacing .  I then left a message for someone from management. to call me and got no response.  Very very disappointing

resp.text: I spoke with Krissi and explained a few items to her concerning her project and attempted to assist her with her project even though Coastal is not performing the project.  Hopefully this will help.  We do not paint cabinets and recommend under normal conditions that this not be done.  Typically, a paint job will have to repeated in the near term due to underlying issues with cabinets themselves.

name: Hilton Perry
text: For many months my wife and I  have wanted to remodel our bath but finding some one that was knowledgeable and and responsive was impossible and had almost given up. A friend told us to call  Coastal Kitchen & Bath and with in just a few days we were set up to meet and go over what we wanted and measure. The next week we were picking out the flooring, cabinets and fixtures we wanted. Today we have the bath that we had visioned for moths. Very responsive and courteous.

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  It can be amazing what a kitchen remodel can do for the appearance of your home and your piece of mind.

name: Chelsie Sotero
text: I have had the pleasure of working with Jill here and she is a delight! This company should be proud to have her as an employee. She is very knowledgeable, helpful and very friendly. I will tell everyone I know to make sure to stop in!!!

resp.text: you're going to love your new mud room

name: me to you
text:
The lady, Jill, was very helpful.  If you go there you have to order what you see on display.  Ordering means a 3 or 4 week delay.  They have a variety of everything related to the bathroom.  My apologies because I did not take photos.

My contractor wants it yesterday. Seems the stuff is never there fast enough for them. They want to go to Lowe's, pick it up, and install it the same day.

resp.text: Thanks for the opportunity.  We do not keep cabinets in stock since there are so many options, sizes and colors.  Unfortunately, contractors can experience delays and then want everything yesterday, like you said.

name: Shawn Taylor
text: Great food

resp.text: Thanks for the great review on food...we'll take the 5 star review but don't serve food.  :)

name: Mike Tate
text: Everything turned out GREAT!  The few minor issues were promptly taken care of and the project was completed on time! Love it!

resp.text: Sometimes a kitchen remodel becomes an art and not a science but we stick with the job until you're happy.

name: Julie Bertolla
text: I had a fantastic experience with my recent remodel. Jill is very knowledgeable and went above and beyond to make sure I was happy.

resp.text: Great to hear.  I hope you enjoy your new cabinets and kitchen remodel

name: Michael Leserra
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thanks for the review.  Hopefully we can assist with your kitchen remodeling project.

name: April Morris
text: Awesome job on our kitchen counters! Defiantly recommend for quality work!

resp.text: you can't go wrong with granite counter tops, easy close cabinet doors and drawers and a tile back splash

name: justin hamilton
text: Top notch service and quality.  They're certified designer was a great help

resp.text: Impact windows are a great replacement to protect against storms

name: Alla Nikitina
text: Out of business

resp.text: Actually, we are not out of business.  We have a new location that we are working on opening up after the Hurricane Sally destruction to our old building but we have been working from remote locations since Sally.  Our website, Facebook page, Pinterest, Google My Business page, etc. all reflect we are open for business and have been open for business.  Our phone number is active as well so feel free to contact us if you have a project you are interested in us quoting for you.  251-943-5358.

name: ted croft
text: They dont stand behind their products! Bought a marble vanity top and they installed two sinks (undermount) and the silicone bled through to the surface of the top and stained it where the silicone was applied for the sinks. The top is ruined! After sending pics Mike told me to call the manufacturer of the silicone to get it fixed or remedied. What terrible customer service. Good thing he sold the company!

resp.text: Ted is correct, the business has been sold to the owner of Folkers Window Company.  The marble vanity top Ted purchased was a old remnant from the warehouse and was "sold as is" for a very cheap price.  Unfortunately with remnants and very low prices, these things happen.  This was communicated to the customer at the time of the sale.  The best way to avoid issues with products and expired warranties is to purchase new products instead of remnants.

name: Anisha Penton
text: Amazing company to work with! Very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful staff.

resp.text: Great choice with Silestone quartz counter tops

name: Gayle Patterson
text: Jill Kinard is very knowledgeable and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks much.  Hopefully we can assist with your remodeling project

name: Cheryl McCoy
text: Good products, pricey

resp.text: Thanks for the business and the review.  No, we are not the cheapest because as you said "good products".  We do not sell junk and we use professional installers and not sub contractors.  In addition, we use stainless steel fasteners, high grade caulks, etc. all which lead to a higher price and a higher quality installation.  Thus, we will typically not be the cheapest...but we're the best.

name: susan evans
text: Rude rude rude. Didn’t say thank you for your business or come back to see us…:(… very disappointed!!!

name: Pamela Sanders
text: Like to visit and get ideas

name: Joseph Johnson
text: The store is well-kept and apt for the hoity toity for sure but, only those that wish to decorate for neutral, bland palettes. Perfect for the suburban Xerox copy family looking to "blend-in" not for an urban stylistic leaning preference.

name: Gecki
text: Urban Home Market is a wonderful resource for great selection of quality furniture and accessories at reasonable prices.  After shopping for dining tables all over Birmingham, we finally bought one at Urban Home and are very happy with it.  Shannon was knowledgeable and helpful, and the delivery guys were also great.  Thank you, Urban Home!

name: Melanie O'Keefe
text: I went in to buy some chairs. I asked the price of a chair and purchased 2. They delivered the wrong chairs. Luckily I had taken a picture of the chair. After a long back and forth the sales person had sold me the wrong chairs. They said they would honor the price and order me the chairs as they didn’t have any in the warehouse. They said it would be 8 weeks. I called 7 weeks later to check on the status. Apparently they never placed the order. Its beyond belief how much they screwed up. They lost a good customer forever!

name: Erin
text: During the pandemic it was difficult to shop for furniture. Urban Home was incredibly helpful and professional. They had a beautiful selection and went out of their way to make it easier for us during such a trying time to move.

name: Dianne Scott
text: Excellent service, good selection of furniture and good prices.

name: Michael Garrett
text: Neat place. A lot of stylish home goods. My wife enjoys the store very much. A friendly, helpful staff. Prices seem a bit high to me, just an opinion.

name: jim lawrence
text: Employee westley is a theif

name: Vicki Everett
text:
As you enter the door of Urban Home, a warm welcome is awaiting you with talented designers ready to create a new home environment for your
needs! We are the receipent of a lovely new room in our home designed by Urban Home and spend many peaceful hours enjoying it! Stop by today and enjoy their Thanksgiving and holiday decorating ideas and head home with new ideas and new decorating items to add more warmth and love to your home !

name: Tommy Barrows
text: Such a large selection. Beautiful pieces. Wonderful staff. Don't miss the close out room in the back right corner for deep discount deals. Ask for Drew, he's one of the buyers and decorators, fabulous!

name: Caroline Lowe
text: Urban Home is the epitome of southern elegance. The staff is incredibly helpful and welcoming. Each visit is a new experience and like coming into your own home. I would recommend Urban Home Market to anyone who wants to bring Southern Class into their home.

name: Lorie Myrick
text:
I love this store! Emily has helped us design our home! We could not be more pleased with the furniture selection, the service, and the kindness and knowledge of all the employees .
It is a place worth your time to visit!

name: Deby Tooker
text: Nice living room offerings but I was disappointed by the lack of bedroom furniture. The staff was friendly and the store was clean. This is a good place to shop for living room furniture and accessories.

name: Josh Hall
text:
The Urban team are very professional, knowledge, courteous and a hell of alot of fun!!!
Emily has an incredible taste level and we are very excited how she is putting our new home together!

name: Amy Baker
text: This place, located at Lee Branch by Hobby Lobby, has consistently impressive interior design pieces such as tables, chairs, mirrors, lamps, chandeliers, etc. —-some styles rustic and some more contemporary —Also, this store has ever-changing home decor knick knacks such as pillows, wall hangings, tableware, etc. Has appropriately helpful associates who are not pushy.

name: Allan Scott
text: Not one person who was working in the store even spoke. I've read this about the store before I experienced it myself. Beautiful furniture and artwork. I'll be buying my furniture where I live in Buckhead, GA. Missed opportunity for this store.

name: Wanda Campbell
text: Very beautiful furniture and accessories. Great people that know their business. LOVE this store!!!

name: dawn reeves
text: From chandeliers to armoires, amazing furniture and more, Urban Home has absolutely everything to furnish your home.  And, the service... Second to none!

name: Remy Helu
text: Great product good helpful people give them a visit.

name: Ashley Truc Do
text: I'm highly recommend this place to anyone who's shopping new furnitures for your homes....such a well trained, professional staffs and great choices of furnitures to choose from.

name: Gwen Dennis
text: Love the store and staff ! Highly recommend this store if you are shopping for new furniture.

name: k arrington
text: I could fill my whole house with this gorgeous furniture! And accessories!

name: Selena Spates
text: I love the home selection  it's a very inviting environment.

name: Karen Johns
text: Unique and stylish furniture. Locally owned.

name: Pamela Sanders
text: Awesome

name: Dave V
text: Very nice furniture and accessory collection.

name: Shasta Fayme
text: This place screams "wine and Xanax soccer mom"

name: Haley Spates Houston
text: Such a beautiful store with amazing home items!!

name: Beverly Hughes
text: I was not acknowledged as a potential customer looking to buy furniture.

name: MaLana Carlee
text: Awesome place

name: Kris Findlay
text: Nice place!

name: Cindy McRee
text: Lovely store

name: Michael Shabani
text: Very unique

name: Rebecca Nichols
text: Awesome merchandise and shopping experience.

name: Wendy Higginbotham
text: Unique items

name: Bailey Fawcett
text: Had absolutely the best experience in there today! My designer, Ashley, was SO kind and attentive. I know I did not give the clearest description of what I wanted but she figured it. I couldn’t be more pleased! I am so excited for my furniture to come!

resp.text: Hi Bailey, thank you so much for your feedback! Ashley is a huge asset to our team in Hoover. She is so knowledgeable and professional. So glad to hear of your experience and we can't wait to hear of how your home turns out! Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Tava Chandler
text: I recently needed to furnish several rooms in our new home. Ashley White came to my home and listened to my needs, measured my spaces, and helped me to identify the pieces needed for each room. Ashley was very knowledgeable and helped make the process of selecting finishes and fabrics enjoyable. Her assistance helped me to be confident in my choices.

resp.text:
Hello Tava!  Thank you for taking the time to share insight regarding your experience with designer Ashley White at the Birmingham Design Center. Ashley is an exceptional designer who actively listens to understand her clients’ needs. From there, Ashley helps them navigate the many custom options while narrowing down on the functional solutions that reflect their style and design preference. Thank you so much for your 5-Star Review. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed your experience and hope that your furnishings bring you joy for many years to come!
- Birmingham Design Center

name: Cynthia Parker
text: My experience at Ethan Allen has been extremely stress free and pleasant. This is due primarily to the friendly, yet professional service of Ashley White.  Her eye for design along with her helpful guidance (actually visiting the space in my home) has made the purchase of my new bed room décor a cinch! Looking forward to purchasing more excellent quality furniture as well as working with Ashley. I appreciate the time she put into making this experience a great one!

resp.text:
Hi Cynthia! Thank You for providing insight about your experience at the Birmingham Design Center. We are so glad that you all decided to give Ethan Allen a try at earning your business. Professional Designer Ashley White actively listens to her client’s needs and concerns in order to tailor solutions that are both functional and aesthetically appealing. Ashley is ecstatic that you enjoyed the design process in entirety. Cynthia, Thank You the 5-Star Rating and for choosing us to be a part of your home furnishing experience!
-Birmingham Design Center

name: Alexa Mallard
text: Ashley was a great help in finding the perfect bed to compliment our EA furniture we bought twenty years ago. She was creative and a great communicator who  helped me visualize a new look. The Hoover store was clean and had several things in place to ensure safety and health during the pandemic.

resp.text: Hi Alexa, thank you for your review. Ashley is a great asset to our team in Birmingham. Safety has always been a focus for Ethan Allen, and especially during this current challenge we are committed to keeping our staff and clients safe.  Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Mary Neil
text: Ashley was very helpful in the showroom and drawing layouts with pricing.  She reached out, was good at communicating, sharing her cell and email. Ashley made it easy and quick working on our sectional, developing the final scheme and completing pricing for our order.  We are very pleased.

resp.text: Hi Mary, thank you so much for the feedback. We are happy that you enjoyed your experience with Ashley at our Birmingham Design Center. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: Elizabeth Reed
text: Remodeling a kitchen after a house fire is stressful, to say the least.  Our kitchen table and chairs came from Ethan Allen nearly 20 years ago so I went back to them to see if they had counter hight stools that would coordinate with existing furniture.  Ashley White knew exactly what I was looking for.  She suggested the perfect leg and finish based on a photo of my table and chairs.  Our new stools were just delivered and they are perfection!  It's always a pleasure to shop in Ethan Allen.  Thank you Ashley, for also making it fun!

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, thank you for such great feedback on your experience with Ethan Allen. We are so glad you were able to work with Ashley and she took such great care of you. Sincerely, Steven Crosby

name: john placey
text: We have enjoyed owning Ethan Allen furniture and furnishings over the decades!  Some pieces like our dining room chairs and table still look and feel brand new even though purchased in the early 1970s!  Their staff is always friendly and helpful!  A bit pricey but we have found that you truly get to enjoy what you paid for!!!

name: Ronald Payne
text: After searching many stores, we found our perfect dining room table at our local Ethan Allen and it was on sale. The table had two leaves which would be needed to host our large family group for Thanksgiving. The sales lady was most helpful and promised that it would be delivered before Thanksgiving only about six weeks away. We were kept informed every step on the way and our table arrived four days prior to Thanksgiving. The leaves are a little hard to get in and out but that should get better with more use. We love the table!

resp.text: Ronald, I am so happy to hear about your experience! We love when the process goes smoothly. I know you will enjoy your table for many Thanksgivings to come. Thank you for reaching out to let us know, we appreciate it.

name: Catherine Benefield
text: The whole experience with Ethan Allen has been pleasant and productive. Designer Kelley Horton guided me through the process of selecting furniture (sofa, 2 chairs, ottomans) and fabrics. The furniture was delivered by professionals who NOT ONCE bumped a wall or door frame. They carefully set up the furniture and carted away the wrappings. The designer then brought paint samples and assisted in selecting a paint color for the walls. From start to finish, I was treated with professionalism and courtesy. The furniture is well made, beautiful in my home, and most importantly, comfortable. Will I purchase from Ethan Allen on Hwy. 150 in Hoover again? Absolutely.

resp.text: Hi Catherine! Thank you for taking the time to write about your wonderful experience at our Hoover location. We appreciate it very much! We are pleased to hear that Kelley could make designing your home a breeze and know it MUST look beautiful. Thank you for also pointing out how amazing our delivery team was; they are quite the asset to Ethan Allen! We hope you enjoy your beautiful pieces for many years to come and appreciate your business very much.

name: Amy Rickles
text: Ashely did a great job of helping us pick a style of furniture, wood accents, and fabric. Well worth the time and money spent. Would highly recommend.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Amy. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us. Ashley is a huge asset to our Birmingham team!

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Kelly, at Ethan Allen, was so fantastic!! She took so much time out for me & assisted me with choosing the fabric for my cornices and curtains. I love my new curtains!!! The reason I rated 3 stars is because Ethan Allen is way over priced I found the same rug I was going to buy from Ethan Allen at RH for much less. I understand Ethan Allen has nice fabrics but I've seen much nicer for far less.

resp.text: Cameron, thank you so much for the feedback! I am so thrilled to hear that you are enjoying your new curtains! Custom curtains can be a big project, I am so happy that Kelly was able to partner with you and design and implement something you love.

name: Pat Ford
text: Great purchasing and service experience! Ashley greeted us warmly when we arrived and quickly showed us what we were looking for and provided material samples that were perfect for our needs.  She made the whole process quick and easy.  The delivery guys were the best I have ever seen.  They  handled the new chairs and sofa with care and were careful to not damage our wood floor in moving the sofa into place.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review Pat! We're happy to hear everything went perfect during your delivery and that our team did an excellent job as well. Thanks for taking the time to write about us. We know Ashley appreciates your compliment as well!

name: Sherry Vaughn
text:
I have been buying Ethan Allen furniture for over 25 years because I know their furniture is a quality product and is timeless. But the thing that I have come to appreciate the most about Ethan Allen is their free design service. The designers know their business well and do a great job.
Kelley and Lauren with Hoover Ethan Allen have both been so helpful with my current home renovation.
I literally cannot praise Kelley Horton enough for how she has helped me to transform my home into a more modern and updated style utilizing what I currently have and incorporating new pieces to blend. She has spent countless hours  in helping me to choose the right pieces for my home including furniture, window treatments, rugs, artwork, bedding, and even down to the smallest decorative accent pieces. My home looks beautifully done with effortless design and functionality now.
The entire process from designing to delivery and installation has been very professional and I could not have asked for better.

resp.text: Thank you for this awesome review Sherry! It brings us so much joy to know how appreciated our brand is and that everyone on our team gives their all. Kelley goes above and beyond for her clients so we're glad to hear that you find her as special as we do! We know every detail matters and strive to ensure that our customer service is superb. Thank you again for all your kind words Sherry. Enjoy your newly renovated home!

name: Randy Mason
text: My wife and I were on vacation and staying at the hotel next door and decided to browse.  Ashley did such an awesome job reviewing and showing us the bed we looking for we bought one that day. We could have waited until we got home to Michigan but really liked the kind and genuine service that Ashley provided. That was our first time in an Ethan Allen store and we have now set up a home appointment back in Michigan. Thank you Ashley!!

resp.text: Thank you for the five star review, Randy! We are delighted to hear how welcoming Ashley was and greatly appreciate you stopping by. Thanks for joining the Ethan Allen family!

name: Emma Bolden
text: From browsing the store to having my pieces delivered, the entire process of buying furniture from the Ethan Allen in Hoover was a dream. We were greeted warmly as we came in the store, and designer Kelley Horton was extremely helpful and kind (and funny!). The delivery crew was prompt, respectful, and careful. An excellent experience all-around!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review of our Hoover location, Emma! We're happy to hear that Kelley made your experience with Ethan Allen a delightful one and that our delivery team took it one step further. We appreciate your business!

name: Alissa Hill
text: I would never purchase from Ethan Allen for anything that has to be made like furniture! We purchase a formal dining table and ten chairs to accompany it. Not only did our table show up with a large dent underneath (unfortunately we didn’t notice until the delivery men sped away) which they refused to do anything about but we placed the order in June 2019.... it’s now October 29 we still have no chairs. Their customer service department has been zero help with figuring out why. I would expect this from Wayfair  but when you spend over 6000.00 dollars for a table and chairs you expect far superior customer service. Guess I’ve learned my lesson and will forever stay out of Ethan Allen.

resp.text:
Alissa, I am so sorry to hear about your experience. I would love to look into it further and find a resolution but I am unfortunately not able to locate your order. Was it possibly purchased under another name? Or could you provide a phone number or order number? If you wouldn't mind emailing me at laura.smith@ethanallen.com I would love to see what we can do to make this situation right.

I look forward to working with you on a resolution.

Laura

name: Hazel Summerville
text: Bought an expensive leather sleeper sofa with anvair mattress that does not work! Call and representative cam out verified slow leas in air bed. NO OTHER RESPONSE!

resp.text: Hazel, I am so sorry to hear your feedback. I reached out to the store and they confirmed that they have been in contact with you. The replacement air mattress has been ordered and they have the estimated promise date to pass along to you. Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We look forward to resolving the issue.

name: Brian Calhoun
text: Ashley White was a pleasure to work with at the Hoover Ethan Allen.  It's really hard to get my wife and I on the same page when it comes to decorating.   Ashley did a great job listening to both of us as well as seeing some of our style when she came to our house for the initial assessment.  She was very patient and came up with great suggestions of things that would work well in our space and with the existing furniture we had.  At the end of the process we now have a room full of art that gives us a finished and professional look.  Thanks Ashley!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for the wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed Ashley's talent as much as we do!

name: Lynn Meany
text: I bought 6 dining chairs, picked out fabric and even ordered extra fabric to make pillows with.  I received excellent service!  Everything arrived on time in perfect condition.   Top notch quality furniture, pleasant sales team, willingness to work to please you...I wouldn't hesitate to shop here again.  Thank you Lauren for all your help!

resp.text: Lynn, Thank you for the feedback! We are thrilled to hear that the experience was perfect and can't wait to work with you again.

name: Becky Charton
text: Ashley at Ethan Allen in Hoover was so patience  with my Aunt and I, she stayed late, called us back after hours and  did not hesitate when asked hard questions! After shopping all over Birmingham EA had some of the most stylish offerings with beautiful leather selections. Your prices were in line with fair market pricing giving us a high quality and a high design selection. Thanks for meeting all our needs!

resp.text: Becky, thank you so much for the feedback. We are thrilled to hear that Ethan Allen was just what you were looking for! We agree with you, Ashley is amazing! I'm happy to hear you adore her as much as we do!  Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know. We appreciate it!

name: Lisa Bice
text: Ashley White is wonderful to work with! - She is professional, intuitive and creative in her approach to pulling together furniture ideas, as well as accessories. I walked in to the store the first day knowing specific items we needed to replace, but did not even know where to begin to find what would work best for our home, with things we already have and want to keep. She asked questions, REALLY listened, and that's where her innate creativity kicked in. She has "nailed it" time after time with unique suggestions, and I look forward to working with her again as we update this home. I have not seen this 5 star level of customer service that Ashley delivers in a long time, and Ethan Allen is fortunate to have this jewel! And we LOVE our new pieces - the quality is wonderful, too! Thank you Ashley!  Lisa Bice

resp.text: Wow, Lisa thank you for this awesome review! We couldn't agree more. Ashley is amazing! We love hearing how appreciated her design service was and that you're home came together beautifully. We strive for quality products and try to ensure our clients receive nothing short of perfection. Thank you for working with us!

name: Mary Sood
text: I love Ethan Allen. They have the most beautiful furniture and accessories, and their designers are phenomenal. They have done such a great job of helping me to select and arrange my furniture and accessories. Everyone who enters my home raves!

name: Countess Fleming
text: Great customer service!  Scott Richardson is an awesome store manager.  Very attentive sales people!  I plan to be back very soon.

name: Electrical Power and Control
text: Nice

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Electrical Power And. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Ethan Allen

name: Susan Lewis
text: Lov Ethan Allen. Just bought a new recliner I love it

resp.text: Thank you Susan for the 5-star review! We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Thanks!

name: Chanda Mitchell
text: Whatever happened to beautiful Ethan Allen furniture? All of their furniture is ultra modern with absolutely no character, all for totally outrageous prices.

name: Leanne Dillard
text: Great service and  great selection of fine furniture and Hunter Douglas window treatments.

name: Gerald Ephraim
text: The furniture There is so nice we spent at least 18 thousand.

name: Jessica Hodges
text: he was remebering we was doing a class play of him we remeber u

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 star review! I'm so glad to hear that you remember the wonderful Ethan Allen! We are so honored to have our company named after such an amazing part of history.

name: Edgar A
text: Does not return calls. They lied to us on several occassions.  Gave us a receipt and when we went to pick up the item they told us the price was incorrect. They will not let us take it per the price on the reciept because it was priced incorrectly.  On a separate item we purchased did not come with the hardware.  When we asked them about it they told us they are universal screws!  Go to Lowes or Home Depot and ask for universal furniture screws!  Called corporate no help! Don't waste your time. Called Peach Tree, GA and they ordered what i needed in 3 minutes.If you want Ethan Allen go to Peach Tree, GA.  If you want better service go to Wal-Mart.

name: Michael Shelby
text: Always friendly and quality furniture.

resp.text:
Michael,
Thank you so much for the feedback!  We take a lot of pride in what we do and the items we create and love seeing comments like this so we can share with our Design Staff and our plants.  We appreciate the kind words and look forward to seeing you in the Design Center soon!
Thanks, again,
Shane

name: Amy Johnston
text: Pricey. Not a great selection.

resp.text:
Thank you Amy for taking the time to leave a review. Ethan Allen is high end furniture and intended to last, we stand by our quality and craftsmanship, this is where you see the difference in the pricing from us to the other brands. The pricing is in line with the high end market for these reasons. We offer a complimentary design service with talented professional designers who are there to help as much or as little as you would like. We also offer Great, flexible finance options. Ethan Allen is always working to stay relevant with the trends but keeping our classic options still available, introducing new introductions every few months.

We appreciate you taking the time to visit our Design Center and wish you luck on you search for the right selections for your home!

name: J C-A
text: Great Furniture!

resp.text: Jocelyn, so happy you love the furniture & thank you so much for the great review! Our team at The Hoover Ethan Allen location always appreciates it!

name: lashun frizzle
text: Great

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to review us, Lashun.   Please let us know what we can do to make the experience better!  We want all Ethan Allen clients to have the very best experience possible and value your feedback!

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Great classic furniture.

name: Zach Rutledge
text: Very expensive.  I visited during one of what is probably an endless array of “going out of business” sales and the sale prices were absolutely sky high… but they will at least negotiate on those sale prices, which is nice.  It’s only a moderate-sized building but it’s crammed full of living room, kitchen and bedroom furnishings.  Only a small selection of mattresses, though.

name: Tom Wright
text: Very nice people, very knowledgeable sales crew. Was so nice to find a place that does not rely on LED lights and cup holders to sell furniture. Quality cost more up front, but is worth the longer lifespan in good products. I'm pleased. Tom and Debbie Wright.

resp.text: Thank you so much Tom & Debbie we appreciate your support. Justin M.

name: Kristy LaFroscia
text: My husband & I were looking for a large dining room table to seat 8-10 comfortably.  They had a huge selection & all were unique.  The customer service was top notch & the table itself is still serving our family, after a year.  I would highly recommend J. Miller's Furniture!  They have some of the most beautiful pieces of furniture in Baldwin County, AL.

resp.text: Kristy thank you so much for the review. We are here because of you !!

name: Marlene Miranda
text: They were having a liquidation sale, but I can see why... The prices are unbelievably high, so once the sale price is adjusted you really end up paying regular price you'd find elsewhere. Crazy.

name: donnie edwards
text: My wife and I fell in love with this furniture store soon as we walked in!! We were looking for a sofa and loveseat and a dinning table and the sales lady/ interior designer, Randi Wilson,helped us find exactly what we needed. She is very knowledgeable of her job and got us a sofa and loveseat and dining table that we wanted. She took her time and was very patient. Again, we love this store and will continue to shop there and do business with Randi if possible. If you need an interior designer, Randi Wilson is the go to designer.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business Mr Edwards..

name: Oak Tree
text: Very attentive to what your looking for. Feel bad for the employees though since the owner is retiring and didn't sell the company to a new buyer to continue the business!

name: Chuck Walls
text: Excellent time to buy

name: Teri Odell
text: Lovely furniture and knowledgeable owner!

resp.text: Thank You so much Teri.. Justin M.

name: Whitney Miller
text: The selection is amazing!

name: Debra Gilly
text: Nice store BUT I do not trust a business that "PRIVATE LABEL" is on almost every item. I found the same items at other stores for much less!!!

resp.text: Debra I am not sure what you are having a problem with? Every thing you have ever bought is a private labeled item made for the company selling the items. You are buying a J.Millers product that we have manufactured. If you have any questions at all please contact me directly I would love to talk.. Thank You Justin Miller..

name: Anthony Guthrie
text: Great store great service

resp.text: Thank you for your great review!!!

name: Lucas Gambino
text: We hired this company to remodel our kitchen. We did not have much knowledge about these types of projects, so we really needed someone who could provide us with insight and direction. This company was everything we could have asked for. They provided a step-by-step instructions on how to think about our remodel project, and offered continuous support and great ideas along the way. We never felt like we were asking too many questions. They were extremely easy to work with. We receive personal attention from the owner and his wife. And even better than the service perhaps was the great price.  We receive tremendous value and would hire them over and over again. After having looked around before hiring them, I feel confident that there is no other kitchen remodel company in the state that is even close on service, price or quality.

name: Aaron Waters
text: I have purchased appliances from European Kitchens of Alabama twice and would not hesitate to purchase again.  Loay and May are tremendous to deal with and have always put our needs above theirs.  I cannot say enough good things about them.

name: Misty Fontenot
text: We love Loay and his amazing showroom and products. When we renovated a historic home in Highland Park, we went to visit him for our entire suite of kitchen appliances. I found the stove of my dreams (a Bertazzoni) that he had in the back and gave us an amazing deal on it - and on everything. My spouse is an Architect and works with him a lot because he’s awesome and so is the business!

name: Rachel Petry
text: Great experience! We just bought our appliances for our kitchen - I shopped online and this place is competitive! Plus amazing service and hospitality! Great selection and beautiful kitchens!

resp.text: Thanks Rachel! Glad you found appliances that worked for you with your taste and aesthetics. Don't hesitate to reach out if we can do anything else for you. -Loay A., Principle

name: Alex Alexander
text: Merideth is so helpful! She always replies promptly to any of my questions and goes over and beyond to assist me in any way! I have enjoyed bouncing ideas around with her. Great experience!

resp.text: Alex, Thank you for kind words about Merideth, she is a great asset to our staff. Thank you for your business.

name: Max Mitchell
text: MEWS is absolutely fantastic - the selection and prices are great. Robyn was the most helpful and insightful person I worked with throughout the entire home building process. She went out of her way to make sure everything was installed correctly and promptly fixed any issues we had.

resp.text: Max, Thank you for the sweet remarks, and we all love taking care of our customers. I will tell Robyn about your appreciation of her helpfulness.

name: Sharon Cain
text: My experience at MEWS was terrific!!!!  Corey was so very helpful, professional and knowledgeable.  He went above and beyond to help me with my lighting selection.  I plain on making future purchases.  Thank you Corey!!!!😁😁😁

resp.text: Thank you Sharon, we love our customers, and I will tell Corey that he made your experience above and beyond.

name: Donna McDonald
text: One of the shops I always look forward to visiting is this one. The displays are beautiful and full of creativity! So after finding the perfect picture frames I was so disappointed in the reception I received at the counter. Besides being ignored, one of the staff was on a tirade about the lunch hours. She even commented about how they never have nice customers while she still ignored me! Gee! That made me feel good!😏

resp.text: Donna, I am so sorry, please call me at the store and this will be corrected. Thank you.

name: Doug Corley
text: Customer service is outstanding. Needed some parts for the plumber to finish on a new construction home that is about an hour away and Robyn had them there quickly which allowed the plumber to finish and not have to come back another day. From the very beginning Robyn has helped my wife pick out all of our fixtures and it has been one of the easiest parts of building our house.

resp.text: Thank you Doug, I have a wonderful staff and we love our customers.

name: Fuck Your God
text: As a plumber they don't have a lot of stuff I need alot of times. But good people I don't know about anything else.

name: Julie Lyle Johnson
text: A very beautiful, clean showroom with everything you need to decorate your home. Corey was very helpful, and ordered just the right ceiling fan for our porch.

resp.text: Thank you Julie, and I'll let Corey know how you appreciated his assistance.

name: Olivia Hardy
text: My husband went to the back to buy a blower unit for the inside part of our A/C. When he got there he found out that they don't sell them as a unit like they used to. You have to buy just the motor, so that's what he bought. When he gets it home, he finds out that it didn't have mount brackets so I went up there to get one that does. I was then told that none of the motors come with bracket mounts. I made the comment that he should have told my husband that so he could have gotten it while he was there. It's hot and this is our A/C unit we're trying to fix in the middle of a hot day. The gentleman said it wasn't his job to know what a person knew or not. I told him that he knew more than my husband on what parts come with what, that's when a woman came around counter and said that she was the owner and that I didn't need to talk to her employee that way. I wasn't being rude or belligerent. I just didn't think it would have been that hard to ask if the customer knew it didn't come with bracket mounts, especially if he brought an older model in. This will be the last time my family and I will be back to that store and before today, I would have recommended that store to anyone. Now I'll tell people to stay away. It's nothing like it used to be.

resp.text:
Mrs. Hardy,
You did not speak to the owner for I am the owner, and I was at another store that day, you spoke to a co-worker, but Mrs. Hardy we have no idea what a customer's needs are until they inform us.
There are hundreds of units, and they change models every year, and the servicemen have to request what they need from us. We are a supply house, not a service company, and we are sorry that your husband did not realize he need additional products, but that was his call and not ours. Your husband was servicing his own unit.
We try and make all customers happy, and were sorry that you were disappointed, but do realize we have no idea what is wrong with a central unit until a serviceman request a particular part.

name: AK _SAVAGE
text: The ladies who work in the front are very friendly and helpful, as well as the associates that are in the showrooms. Huge variety of lighting, many are on display for the customer to see. There's something for everyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the compliments on our staff,  and we want to have a good selection for our sweet customers.

name: Richard Brown
text: In addition to having to the plumbing part that I needed, they have a lot of awesome stuff that would decorate any home beautifully

resp.text: Thank you Richard, and we love taking care of our customers.

name: lilly Keene
text: Wonderful customer service and very happy with my purchase good to find the quality locally.

resp.text: Thank you Lilly, I don't know how I missed your sweet review until now.

name: Judy Meyer
text: Very nice

resp.text: Thank you Judy, we appreciate our sweet customers.

name: Cory Hardy
text: Great people and great materials I recommend MEWS to ANYONE

resp.text: Thank you Cory, it is so sweet of you to tell people about us. We do love our customers.

name: Jared Toone
text: Great selection, but prices seemed really high.

resp.text:
Jared, We try and have a selection for all budgets and hope you will give us the opportunity to service you again.
Sorry, I've been so long in responding, but I have not been receiving these reviews until this past week.

name: Dawn Czermak
text: UNBELIEVABLE selection. I have no words. Whatever you are looking for - they have it. Anything.

resp.text: Thank you Dawn, we want to be there to service our sweet customers and have the products to meet your needs.

name: Thomas Thompson
text: Good prices Goodwill variety great service

resp.text: Thank you Thomas, that is so sweet of you to take the time to do this.

name: Sara Knaub
text: Kinda snotty people

resp.text: Please call me and let me know whom you dealt with, this is a very unusual comment for my staff, I usually get just the opposite of how sweet and kind they are.

name: Sherry Hester
text: Wow I thought it was just lighting. This store has a little bit of everything. Checked it out.

resp.text: Sherry, Thank you for shopping with us, and we hope to see you again soon. We do love our customers.

name: Merri Bass
text: Staff is super helpful !!

resp.text: Thank you Merri, we appreciate our customers and want to take care of your needs.

name: mike clinard
text: Great staffed, provided instructions on suggested part

resp.text: Thank you Mike, and sorry I missed your review.

name: Chadrick Piper
text: Great service

resp.text: Thank you Chadrick.

name: Stacey Adams
text: High prices

resp.text: Stacey, We try to have product in all price ranges to satisfy our customers, I hope you will let our staff service you again and work with you.

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Excellent group and very nice office

name: Steven Smith
text: Bought a great sofa.

name: Maggie Hardin
text: Absolutely love this store. Beautiful furniture and accessories for your home.

name: Terri Comer
text: Beautiful decor and a lovely little shop but frightfully expensive.  $300 for a small throw pillow - seriously?  Helpful friendly staff and a great place to dream.

name: Tanisha Foster
text: I was in awe at the selections presented in this store.  If your needs are custom chairs, tables and upholstery,  this is a place to start.  There were a few brands that were new to me, but they didn't fail my appetite for uniqueness.  If you are a lover of all things untraditional,  you will not be disappointed. This is the place for you.

name: Paula Shea
text: Have picked up several pieces here. Doug is great to work with and everything there is extremely helpful.

name: Nicole Faulkner
text: Doug was very knowledgeable  about Stressless chairs.  He helped us choose the perfect color to coordinate with our current furniture. The business has a promotion when you donate to the North Alabama Food Bank.

name: Jane Young
text:
Stressless recliners were introduce to me by my son. Checked on internet for a store that sold stressless and the Huntsville store was on list. Visited store on a Sunday to purchase a chair. Rod was the salesman. Could not have ask for better service. Both gentlemen were very helpful.
Cannot wait to get my chair and enjoy it. Highly recommend the store if you are looking for great service and quality furniture.

resp.text: Jane- Thank you so much for taking the time to give our team a great review. We hope you and family enjoy your Stressless Chair for years to come! We appreciate your business and are happy to help you in the future for any of your furniture needs.

name: Bree k
text: Looks a lot better than the old store that was in it's place 👍🏻

resp.text: Thank you Bree. We love being part of the Huntsville community. Visit often, we have new arrivals monthly!

name: Maggie Moon
text: Very nice furniture store, and helpful friendly staff.

resp.text: Maggie- Thank you for taking the time to give us a positive review. We really appreciate it!

name: Susan Levine
text: Beautiful store and furniture, Great lines. The staff is knowledgeable and not pushy at all.   You feel like they are there to help... not to make a sale!

resp.text: Susan- Thank you so much for your kind review! We love our team and are happy that you had a relaxed shopping experience. We are here to help and love what we do!

name: Kenny W
text: Bought a very expensive Stickley Leopold Chair.  Rarely used, it lost a tuck button in an area not subjected to direct contact.  Disappointed that Stickley, touted for high quality, produced such a product and does not warranty its upholstery.  Nonetheless Townhouse Galleries' owner told me they would fix it regardless of Stinkley's lack of warranty.  Good place to do buiness!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kenny! We appreciate your business and willingness to let us offer the customer service you deserve. We hope you enjoy your Leopold Chair for years to come.

name: Leonard Girard
text: Very  expensive my budget won't come close to those prices.  Guess we  will lower our expectation .

resp.text: Leonard- Thank you for visiting Townhouse Galleries. We are sorry you were not able to find value in the quality of the furniture we offer here in North Alabama. Our furniture is expected to last for many years and we hope that makes our customers feel comfortable in their investment. Again, thank you for visiting and we hope you enjoyed the time that you were in the store. If you have a specific budget in mind for your furniture we would be happy to see if we can find something that would fit.

name: Jimmy McMurry
text: Great place bring your wallet

resp.text: Thank you Jimmy! We hope all of our clients understand the quality of the furniture and service we offer!

name: Carmen M
text: Had to edit. Will be revise.

resp.text: Carmen, we are sorry you feel that our store didn't meet your expectations. We would love an opportunity to get it right. Please feel free to reach out to one of our owners if you need further assistance.

name: Mia Wilson
text: Beautiful showroom and great management. The manager, Jason, and consultant, Linda Lee, were so kind and helpful. We will definitely be customers for life because of the type of service we received! Great work Summer Classics!

name: Donna Bell
text: Linda Lee Count, Design Advisor went above and beyond to be helpful.  I would highly recommend her services. Summer Classics furniture is beautiful and worth every dollar!

name: Neal Jackson
text: We bought an outdoor love seat and two chairs. The communication between the shipping company and corporate office is terrible. The items arrived in August of 2020 and were damaged when assembled by the delivery company. The replacements arrived on April 13th, 2021. When you call to ask questions, no one will respond. With the high prices of these items, customer service should be much better.

resp.text:
Hi Neal,
We apologize for the wait on your backordered product and experience as this is not the norm. We're glad you have the product now and hope you can enjoy life's best moments.

name: Angela King
text: I am so impressed with Jason Bigbie and his team. I had a delivery issue that could have been a very painful experience for me but he took control and got his team involved and everything is was resolved within an hour.  He always responds to his emails promptly. The service level is a 10!

name: Molly Chew Baker
text: Beautiful showroom! Helpful, wonderful staff! Full of great design help. Very accommodating team, led by a great manager. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Luci McMillan
text: Amazed by the customer service!!! They were so sweet and helpful. They knew about everything in inventory and helped to choose the perfect furniture for my house.

name: Kaelin Butts
text: Had an amazing experience here today! The manager Jason is so kind and worked with me for over an hour to get the perfect piece for my home. I can’t wait to pick it up!

name: Rap V
text: The staff has been extremely helpful. Very kind and patient.

name: C Jenkins
text: Great store! Lots of options! Staff is very nice and really want to help you find the right furniture!

name: Joshua Klapow
text: Summer Classics is simply the best.  We are so fortunate that the company that manufactures furniture for the finest locations everywhere is in our back yard.   Jason and Emma were exceptional.  This was our second purchase.  We purchased the first set of pool furniture over a decade ago- it still looks spotless.  Jason and Emma worked with us to add to the collection, create some unique color options for the furniture pads and did this all within our budget.  No pressure- just help and support. Nothing better than Summer Classics Home Birmingham.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Nicole Shultz
text: I love shopping and working with everyone at this Summer Classics!   Jason is the most knowledgeable person I have ever met on all things furniture.  As a designer, I know I can send my clients in and have them well taken care of and trust the quality of furniture!  I highly recommend them for outdoor furniture and it is also one of my favorite places for light fixtures!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Jonavan Arguedas
text: The store is full of loving people, they are also helpful and kind, not to mention patient. They help with every desire and answer any question you may have. The manger even took the time to talk to me and have a nice conversation. The design consultants also take the time to explain the history and make you feel like you belong in the family. Customer service is top notch and I would recommend summer classics to any and everyone!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Julio Tabin
text: Great place to visit and shop. The staff is incredible and very helpful. The manager of the store is very kind. Helpful and always helping others. Great place to visit and  buy high quality outdoor furniture. Love it!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Julia Biddy
text: Very impressed with this store. Beautiful, quality furniture you won’t find anywhere else. My husband and I just moved into a new home, and our design consultant, Alex Ryan, was especially helpful in choosing furniture and helping us design our home. She was knowledgeable and fun to work with. We look forward to returning next time we are in the Birmingham area.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Lisa Carden
text: Summer Classics is such a great company. They are so generous and have been willing to donate to our school on several occasions. Robin Jones is great to work with and always finds the perfect items for us.  I would recommend Summer Classics to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Alex Ryan
text: The manger Jason is so well versed and has extensive product knowledge! He makes you feel like your home. The staff is great as well. It’s beautiful and makes you feel like your in the lap of luxury.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Becky Sellers
text: Summer Classics is one of the best furniture stores in Pelham. I enjoy shopping at this store and Robin Jones is very helpful. She is kind and patient. I would recommend this store to anyone looking for high quality furniture.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Christy Teaster
text:
Love this place!! The manager, Jason B. is so informative. He delivers excellent customer service! Go in and see him. He will lead you the right direction, to make sure you are completely satisfied.
Can't beat the customer service and quality of items.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Christina Miskelly
text: This is a beautiful store full of high quality furniture. Robin Jones is always so helpful when I need to find something. I enjoy coming during Christmas to new items for my collection.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review. We look forward to see you come back soon.

name: Mark Froemming
text: We recently purchased some Newport Collection pieces for our beach house and had the pleasure of working with Cynthia Duke.  We had seen print ads for Summer Classics but had never really known much about the product.  Fortunately Cynthia was working the day we visited the showroom.  She was very knowledgeable about the different collections, and quickly gained our trust.  She has a very positive attitude and it is apparent she loves what she does and is very invested in her customer relationships.  We spent almost two hours with her and never expended her patience.  After listening to us and showing us many collections, we decided on the Newport Collection.   While expensive, Cynthia showed us the quality of design and construction of the Summer Classics products;  and we proceeded to order a sofa, two chairs, two ottomans, two side tables, a coffee table, and multiple pillows and bolsters.   Several weeks later we called Cynthia for another Summer Classic solution.  We needed two window bench cushions and she solved the problem immediately, ordering two custom dimension cushions with a Sunbrella fabric unique to Summer Classics!   Cynthia is a “rock star” and I have recommended her to friends.   She is a great asset to Summer Classics and we look forward to working with her in the future for further outdoor furniture needs.  I highly recommend her!  Mark Froemming

text: Our church had a pipe burst and it flooded half of our sanctuary on a Saturday. The workers were quick, efficient and they expedited the work, so it was completed before our next Sunday service! Thank you Carol’s Carpet and Slade Price for the amazing job that you all did for us. We highly recommend Slade and the installers at Carol’s Carpet!

resp.text: We are glad you had a good experience. Thank you for leaving a review.

text: We had a wonderful experience with Carol’s carpet! Debra was our sales lady and she was extremely helpful and very knowledgeable! text: These folks have a high rating for a reason.  Kellie perfectly matched a 16 year old Brazilian Cherry in the rest of our home for our living room reno.  Installers are top notch, showed up on time and did a phenomenal job.  Look no further for your flooring needs.

text: I was disappointed when called.  They advertise that they do bathroom renovations, but THEY DO NOT.  They are limited in what they do to tile and floor coverings.

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear of your bad experience. Just in case you have reviewed the wrong company, please message me with your phone number. Carol’s Carpet Flooring America can tear out your entire bathroom and completely replace it if you like. My name is Drew and I would love to assist you with your project.

Thanks for your review, Drew Courson

text: I purchased some granite from Carol’s Carpet recently. If you decide to use them, Deborah is the best! The experience was great overall. Everything arrived on time and things. They were super nice until they received my money. Smh

text: We just had floors installed by Carols Carpets. We would highly recommend them. Kellie knew it was overwhelming to pick out the color.  She listened to my ideas and picked out samples. text: My whole experience was very positive.  Starting from the first day I walked into the store. Slade was not only very knowledgeable but also friendly and accommodating.  After shopping around, I  made the great decision to go with Carol's.  They not only matched the competitor's price, but beat it! Their selection was also better and was able to settle on a beautiful carpet.  The installation was quick and easy and the installers did a wonderful job. I can't say enough good things about Carol's Carpets.  If you're looking for flooring, look no further than Carol's!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!
